definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: A doctor was having an affair with his nurse.
sentences.chinese: 有位医生，常跟科室里的女护士鬼混。

sentences.english: A first-grader came to the ophthalmology office where I work to have his vision checked.
sentences.chinese: 一个一年级学生来到我办公的眼科室检查视力。

sentences.english: Shandong Provincial Hospital now has 74 clinical and medical science departments.
sentences.chinese: 山东省立医院现设有74个临床和医技科室。

sentences.english: Your present work unit is South Hospital. What section do you work in?
sentences.chinese: 你现在的工作单位是南方医院，那你在什么科室工作？

sentences.english: The author introduced this method by evaluating some department in hospital.
sentences.chinese: 本文通过某一科室的工作评价具体介绍了该方法。

sentences.english: Each section office all by clinical seasoned expert is taught advocate examine.
sentences.chinese: 各科室均由临床经验丰富的专家教授主诊。

sentences.english: The indexical evaluation system on quality of medical care in medical detection…
sentences.chinese: 从而研究并构建出医技科室医疗质量评价体系。

sentences.english: Clinical department building was an etemal topic in hospital management.
sentences.chinese: 加强临床业务科室建设是医院管理的永恒课题。

sentences.english: There is little or no mobility between departments in different medical specializations .
sentences.chinese: 不能在不同专业科室之间随意变动。

sentences.english: MethodAll the nursing staff were organized to participate in the reading report meeting regularly to share learning experience.
sentences.chinese: 方法组织科室全体护理人员定期进行读书体会交流。

sentences.english: The indexical evaluation system on quality of medical care in medical detection department was established.
sentences.chinese: 从而研究并构建出医技科室医疗质量评价体系。

sentences.english: If the brain was in departments, in what section were recollections stored?
sentences.chinese: 如果大脑按部门划分，那么记忆在哪一科室储存？

sentences.english: Negative pressure aspirator is necessary to every clinical sections.
sentences.chinese: 负压吸引器是各个临床科室所必备的医疗设备。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the methods of nursing department in the development of excellent department.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨护理部在创建先进机关科室中的做法。

sentences.english: Strengthening clinical medical group management and implementing resident standardizing training.
sentences.chinese: 抓好临床科室医疗组的管理落实住院医师规范化培训。

sentences.english: Heads of departments and doctors were trained yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天对科室主任和医生进行了培训。

definition: department of gynecology and obstetrics/birth clinic
